name: Bo's GitHub
tagline: This is the Bo's GitHub Pages!
body:
### Hello from PythonBo!

You're most likely here to see, clone, fork, and maybe even issue a pull request for the PythonBo's Python GUI Programming with Qt files. These files supplement the free (old) course found on YouTube, but also the new (and better) course on Udemy - [https://www.udemy.com/python-gui-programming/](https://www.udemy.com/python-gui-programming/)

The Python GUI Programming repository can be found here: [https://github.com/Deusdies/pythonbo](https://github.com/Deusdies/pythonbo).

Keep in mind, however, that at the time of this writing (March 2014), it is out of date. I will update it soon!

Click the link above to see my other (public) repositories!

### Contact me
If you want to get in touch with me, please email me at python@bo.vc . Please, for specific issues with the code, open a new Issue in the GitHub itself so that everyone can see.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
